about_the_game:
So you think you have what it takes to become a Shephard?

Well, If you do then that's perfect! We just recently lost our old Shephard... due to some *unforeseen* circumstances... and now we have an opening! All you need to do is help a cute and fluffy trio of sheep through a field and into that barn there.

Sounds simple enough right?

Well it would be if it wasn't for the river that's running through it... and the new highway the locals just installed! Or wait... was it a railway? And is that a UFO in the distance?!

Do you still want the job?

Guide your trio of sheep to the barn!


Using your cursor scare the sheep towards the barn! Collect all three of them and you win! Well... at least for that level. The sheep will always run from your cursor so be careful not to push them into a precarious situation that might put them in harms way, the trio also like to run in a herd so they will always try their best to stick together if you move them in a group! Oh! And watch out for the timer, if you take too long to get them inside who knows what might happen!

Overcome levels filled with whacky obstacles!


With over 20 levels to play through and more on the way Oh, Flock! is filled with content, with each level posing a new challenge or obstacle to overcome! There are rapid rivers, angry dogs, huge tornados and all sorts of other hurdles that pose a threat to your farm.

Collect coins to customise your sheep!


In every level there are coins to collect, push your sheep towards them to pick them up and then, from the main menu, you can head inside the barn!
Spend your hard earned cash to give your sheep a fresh new colour or even buy a little hat so they can go out into the wilderness in style! Unfortunately for you these cosmetics don't make your sheep any smarter but they do make them look cool!

Experience tons of different environments and levels!


With over 6 different environments to play through game has ton's of exciting level design and enemies to overcome! Travel through the obvious locations such as fields, forests and deserts before finding yourself in the the icy tundra, 1000s of meters underwater or even up in space! Each environment has unique obstacles specific to that location.

short_description: After a strange series of events you find yourself shoved into the role of a Shephard on a very peculiar farm! With only your wits and trusty cursor by your side guide your flock of sheep through a series of environments filled with a variety of obstacles and predators!
